casebody.data:
No. 10-1126. Jacob C. Springer, Petitioner v. Steve Perryman, Judge, Circuit Court of Alabama, Randolph County, et al. 564 U.S. 1055, 132 S. Ct. 47,

180 L. Ed. 2d 915,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 5026. July 25, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 563 U.S. 988, 131 S. Ct. 2455, 179 L. Ed. 2d 1210, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 3721.
